snippet: An impersonator’s postings on Twitter are poking fun at the Knicks legend Walt Frazier’s style of basketball analysis, heavy on words that rhyme.
lead_paragraph: An impersonator’s postings on Twitter are poking fun at the Knicks legend Walt Frazier’s style of basketball analysis, heavy on words that rhyme.

headline.seo: The Essence of Walt Frazier, Captured on Twitter
headline.main: A Faux Walt Frazier, in All His Rhyming Glory
